com.snakybo.torch.graphics.shader

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.asset.Asset
      • com.snakybo.torch.graphics.shader.Shader

  • public final class Shader
extends Asset

    The shader class is a direct link to the low-level GLSL shaders.

    A shader is usually attached to a Material, however it is possible to manually use a shader in the Component.onRenderObject() method.

    Since:
    1.0
